ygData.subject: RE: RE Instruments vs. melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s an interesting one for you.  I have a very good paladin friend that I duel with all the time.  Its a great way to try out new tactics.  Ever since she
ygData.messageBody:
Here's an interesting one for you. I have a very good paladin friend that I
duel with all the time. Its a great way to try out new tactics. Ever since
she got her greater heal (level 39) she's been trouncing me quite
regularily.
Yesterday, just for fun, I said "okay, I'm going to fight you without my
weapons". She was a little confused, but a agreed. Twisting Hymn, DDD, and
Chords with a lute equipped got her down to 15 HPs before we called it off.
I had about a bubble left. Not bad considering when I fought her with my
weapons she wasn't even down to half life when I was running for the zone.
For reference, I fight either with a staff of writhing and a silvery axe, or
a silver axe/dirk combo.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 38 Bard
Erollisi Marr
